Title: Advance victoriously while following Chairman Mao's revolutionary line
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Jilin Province Movie Distribution Company (吉林省电影发行公司革委会)
Publisher: Jilin renmin chubanshe (吉林人民出版社)
Notes: Lin Biao is the inventor of the Little Red Book and the architect of the Mao cult. After Liu Shaoqi's downfall he becomes Mao's designated successor. In 1971 he dies under mysterious circumstances.
